verbose_text: Transfection of miR-143 significantly inhibited the proliferation of LNCap cells (P = 0.0073), increased the percentage of externalized phosphatidylserine (P = 0.0042), activated the caspase-3 (P = 0.0012), and decreased the expression of Bcl-2 (P = 0.012) when compared with the control miRNA group.
